section.p: This section is about using the Ankh addin.
Creating repositories - Will teach you how to create repositories and how to control the with the Ankh addin under Visual Studio .NET

Basic work cycle - Will teach you how a ordinary work cycle is done. It will teach you:
how to update your Working copy
how to do changes to your local files
how to remove or rename your files
how to see differences between your local files and the ones in the repository
how to commit changes to a repository
Setting properties - Will teach you how to to sett properties on files, directories or repisitories.
